sense.gloss: the five viscera and the six internal organs
inside one's body, in one's heart
the six internal organs (large intestine, small intestine, gallbladder, stomach, san jiao, urinary bladder)
good-for-nothing, spineless, gutless, spiritless, feckless, pluckless, cowardly, tame, timid, pathetic, pitiful, disappointing, shameful, useless, worthless
coward, namby-pamby, wimp, weak-kneed person, spineless person
lungs, bottom of one's heart, vital point
cannot understand, doesn't make sense, unconvincing, hard to swallow, doesn't ring true
to lose one's energy, to be cowardly
to understand, to be convinced, to be satisfied

sdata.j: ↑何↑↓なん↓↑人↑↓にん↓も↑空↑↓そら↓の↑胃↑↓い↓の↑腑↑↓ふ↓では↑愛国↑↓あいこく↓↑者↑↓しゃ↓たり↑得↑↓え↓ない。
sdata.e: No man can be a patriot on an empty stomach.

sdata.j: くーっ、ビールが↑五臓六腑↑↓ごぞうろっぷ↓にしみわたる。やっぱり↑仕事↑↓しごと↓の↑後↑↓のち↓はビールだね。
sdata.e: Ahhh! Feel that beer seep into every fiber of my being. Yep, nothing beats a cold one after work.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓にはどうも↑腑↑↓ふ↓に↑落↑↓お↓ちない。
↑私↑↓わたし↓にはどうも↑腑↑↓ふ↓に↑落↑↓お↓ちない。
